description:
Spoilers are coming.The entire plot of Game Of Thrones season seven has reportedly been leaked online.According to the Huffington Post, a Reddit user going by the name away for the lads posted an enormous list of very detailed spoilers. 前方剧透预警。《权利的游戏》第七季全部剧情已经泄露了啊！消息来自《赫芬顿邮报》，红迪网用户名为“away for the lads”的人爆出了十分详细的超多猛料。

Jon Snow and Daenerys will hook up by episode 7; Tyrion meanwhile begins to worry about Dany's temperament, after she tells Drogon to burn some Westeros lords - including Sam's father Randyll - for refusing to kneel before her; Arya will execute the remaining Freys; Jaime will finally turn on his siter for reneging on the fight against the white walkers; Jorah is cured of his greyscale by Sam, who had discovered an account of an old maester in Oldtown who had cured himself ; Jon Snow leads a team up north to capture a wight to prove to the southern houses the impending threat. Jon Snow和Daenerys将在第七集联姻；“小恶魔”Tyrion十分担心在她让Drogon烧了维斯特洛大陆的地主包括Sam的父亲Randyll后Dany的脾气会爆发；Arya将处死尚且活着的Freys；Jaime最后将发动他的siter为与异鬼斗争；得灰鳞病的Jorah被Sam治好了，Sam在奥尔德敦发现一位得病并自愈的老学士；Jon Snow率领一组军队，抓获一只白鬼以此向南方证明危险即将来临。

Game Of Thrones season seven returns later than usual, in mid 2017. Unlike previous ones, this penultimate season will only have seven episodes rather than ten.《权利的游戏》第七季回归晚一些到2017年中期。不同以往，本季只有七集。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

  • 备战CET6口语：自我介绍篇之必用词汇（1）
  • 别自卑，你比你想象的更成功
  • 单身和独处的时候可以如何享受生活？

title: 《权利的游戏》第七季不能再详细的剧透
